# Throne Room (Room)
## Overview
**Throne Room**

**Earnings** Influence +15 

**Benefit** bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local), and [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks 

**Create** 25 Goods, 5 Influence, 25 Labor, 5 Magic (1,650 gp); **Time** 40 days 

**Size** 40â€“80 squares 

**Upgrades From** [[Ceremonial Room (Room)|Ceremonial Room]], [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]] 

A Throne Room is used to receive important visitors, such as nobles. The room contains a throne, various decorations, and a few seats for visitors. By spending an hour conversing with visitors, the host of the room gains a +1 bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local), and [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks to influence or learn about those guests for the next 24 hours.
